payload: **Oil & Gas E&P**: Active (20.0 cats/10co), Compressed Val (5.4x).

CEO: Focus on operational efficiency and margins.
CorpDev: Pause large M&A; focus on minor bolt-ons.
Divest non-core assets to raise cash.
Banker: Private placements and credit facility amendments.
